inlineContent.text: ScrobbleKit is a Swift package that simplifies the integration of Last.fm’s API across all the Apple platforms, enabling the creation of applications that interact seamlessly with the popular music platform.

This package encompasses a comprehensive set of Last.fm API methods, providing developers with the tools to perform essential tasks such as scrobbling tracks, retrieving user charts, obtaining detailed album information, and supporting a wide range of other functionalities available in the Last.fm API catalog.
To begin using ScrobbleKit, you can check out our
guide for an easy introduction. Alternatively, you can select one of the topics below to go through specific functionalities in ScrobbleKit with step-by-step instructions.

abstract.text: Streamlined interaction with Last.fm on Apple platforms
Get personal tags for tracks from a user on Last.fm.
Retrieves a list of tracks similar to the given track and artist.
Get personal tags for artists from a user on Last.fm.
Represents the fields of metadata of a song that may be corrected when attempting to scrobble it.
Gets a list of the top tracks on Last.fm ordered by popularity.
Tag a track using a list of user-supplied tags.
Searches for artists similar to the given query.
Fetches the top artists for a given country or metro area.
For services requiring authentication, discover how to sign in with a Last.fm account using ScrobbleKit.
Gets the tags applied by an individual user to an album on Last.fm.
Tag an album using a list of user-supplied tags.
Represents an item (track, artist, or album) that has been tagged.
Represents a tag in the Last.fm ecosystem.
Retrieves the top tags for a given track.
Returns a list of all the artists in a user’s library.

The main class for interacting with the Last.fm API.
Represents the information retrieved after a successful authentication with Last.fm services.
Represents the search terms available for Last.fm searches.

Retrieves the corrected artist and track names for a given track name and artist name.

Searches for an album by name. Returns album matches sorted by relevance.
